rewardItem.name: Wonder Pass
rewardItem.description: A rare pass that permits you to wonder trade again instantly.

rewardPokemon.name: Sin Ninetales
rewardPokemon.description: While it will guide travelers who get lost on a snowy mountain down to the mountain’s base, it won’t forgive anyone who harms nature.

rewardItem.name: Stone Ball
rewardItem.description: A rare  ball with an increased chance to drop an evolution stone.

rewardItem.name: Empty Disc
rewardItem.description: An empty disc used to teach your Pokémon a full new move set. Use it with caution.

rewardItem.name: Battle Coin
rewardItem.description: Reward for joining a PCG tournament. This token can be spend on various rare items and Pokémon in the battle coin shop or kept as reminiscence.

rewardItem.name: IV Reset
rewardItem.description: Completely changes the individual values of a Pokémon.

rewardItem.name: Mood Mint
rewardItem.description: Delicious mint, which completly changes the nature of your pokemon.

rewardItem.name: Fighting Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

rewardItem.name: Nest Ball
rewardItem.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when used on a Pokémon that can evolve twice.

rewardPokemon.name: Haxorus
rewardPokemon.description: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.

rewardPokemon.name: Silvally
rewardPokemon.description: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.

rewardPokemon.name: His Goodra
rewardPokemon.description: Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell. It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.

rewardPokemon.name: Silvally
rewardPokemon.description: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.

missions.name: [EVENT] Catch dragon or normal type Pokemon!

rewardPokemon.name: Dialga
rewardPokemon.description: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

rewardPokemon.name: Sawsbuck
rewardPokemon.description: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

rewardPokemon.name: Regigigas
rewardPokemon.description: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

rewardPokemon.name: Snorlax
rewardPokemon.description: This Pokémon’s stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
